verses.name: Psalms 57:1
verses.text: Be merciful unto me, O God, be merciful unto me: for my soul trusteth in thee: yea, in the shadow of thy wings will I make my refuge, until these calamities be overpast.

verses.name: Psalms 57:2
verses.text: I will cry unto God most high; unto God that performeth all things for me.

verses.name: Psalms 57:3
verses.text: He shall send from heaven, and save me from the reproach of him that would swallow me up. Selah. God shall send forth his mercy and his truth.

verses.name: Psalms 57:4
verses.text: My soul is among lions: and I lie even among them that are set on fire, even the sons of men, whose teeth are spears and arrows, and their tongue a sharp sword.

verses.name: Psalms 57:5
verses.text: Be thou exalted, O God, above the heavens; let thy glory be above all the earth.

verses.name: Psalms 57:6
verses.text: They have prepared a net for my steps; my soul is bowed down: they have digged a pit before me, into the midst whereof they are fallen themselves. Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 57:7
verses.text: My heart is fixed, O God, my heart is fixed: I will sing and give praise.

verses.name: Psalms 57:8
verses.text: Awake up, my glory; awake, psaltery and harp: I myself will awake early.

verses.name: Psalms 57:9
verses.text: I will praise thee, O Lord, among the people: I will sing unto thee among the nations.

verses.name: Psalms 57:10
verses.text: For thy mercy is great unto the heavens, and thy truth unto the clouds.

verses.name: Psalms 57:11
verses.text: Be thou exalted, O God, above the heavens: let thy glory be above all the earth.
